currentIssues.description: No visible focus indicators on settings and upload buttons
currentIssues.location: Settings gear icon and Upload Song button

currentIssues.description: Gray text (#6b7280) on dark background fails WCAG AA contrast ratio
Inconsistent text sizes and unclear hierarchy between chord names and lyrics
currentIssues.location: Chord annotations (Fmaj7, Em7, etc.) vs lyrics

currentIssues.description: Insufficient vertical spacing between chord lines and lyrics
Buttons lack hover states and interactive feedback

recommendations.title: Increase lyrics text contrast
recommendations.description: Change gray text to lighter shade for WCAG AA compliance (4.5:1 ratio)

recommendations.title: Add aria-labels to icon buttons
recommendations.description: Provide screen reader accessible labels for icon-only buttons

recommendations.title: Add focus indicators to all interactive elements
recommendations.description: Implement visible focus rings for keyboard navigation on all buttons and interactive elements

recommendations.title: Establish clear chord/lyrics hierarchy
recommendations.description: Use consistent sizing and weights to differentiate chords from lyrics
recommendations.code:
/* Chords */ className='text-lg font-bold text-yellow-500'
/* Lyrics */ className='text-base text-gray-300 leading-relaxed'

recommendations.title: Ensure 44x44px touch targets
recommendations.description: Make all interactive elements meet minimum touch target size

recommendations.title: Implement consistent vertical rhythm
recommendations.description: Add proper spacing between chord annotations and lyrics using an 8px grid system
recommendations.code:
className='space-y-4' /* Between chord/lyric pairs */
className='mb-2' /* Between chord and its lyric */

recommendations.title: Add hover and active states
recommendations.description: Implement interactive states for better user feedback
